Location:
- Outdoor condenser unit (Ameristar Heating & Cooling) on exterior equipment pad near the building.

Observations:
- Gray metal cabinet with horizontal slotted louvers.
- Front panel with Ameristar label intact.
- Screws present; fins behind louvers appear clean and undisturbed.
- No visible damage, dents, or stains.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- No immediate repairs needed.
- Schedule routine HVAC maintenance (annual inspection and cleaning).
- Ensure proper clearance: maintain at least 2 ft (0.6 m) on sides and 4–5 ft (1.2–1.5 m) above; trim nearby vegetation.
- Check electrical disconnect accessibility and verify positive drainage away from the unit.
- Periodically inspect for corrosion or bent fins during cleaning.
